TopicTitle: What is the minimum escape velocity of Kerbin?

Articles.Content: Curious, as I am learning the physics of launch, still haven\'t mastered orbit...

The wiki lists it as:

Escape velocity from surface: 3430.45 m/s

Theoretically you could lower the excape velocity as low as you want (without reaching zero) by increasing your orbit. Technically Kerbin\'s sphere of influence caps the maximum orbit you can reach at 84275km, which corresponds to an escape velocity of ~288m/s.
